## PlayerCameraEventPayloads."PLAYER\_CAMERA.SET\_OFFSET" property

Emitted when the offset of the camera is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerCameraEvent.SET_OFFSET]: {
        playerCamera: PlayerCamera;
        offset: Vector3Like;
    };
```
